summary: Meet Bobby Bones is the Ultimate Monster companion mod. He works exactly the same as a vanilla companion. He is extremely faithful to the player, and is totally unique. There is no other like him in the Skyrim world.
descriptionHtml:
CHANGELOG 1.4
==============
- Fixed Bobbys AI so when you dismiss him or make him wait, he will stay in that location
- Re-Added a version where Bobby Levels with the player

Changelog Version 1.3
------------------------------
-set Bobby to level 50 instead of leveling with the player
-set Bobby to be unagressive when not in battle
-Removed Chain Lightning and Frost Rune spells and replaced with Heal Other and Ice Spike.
-Fixed Bobby uncontrollibly shooting off spells for no apparent reason.
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1520317-1332798326.jpg[/img]
author: clintmich
